#summary Demo applications distributed with the gwt-gadgets distribution.

On iGoogle, choose the _Add Stuff..._ link on the top right of the main page, then on the bottom left of the next page, choose the _Add Feed or Url_ link.  When the dialog comes up,  add the following url:

`http://gwt.google.com/samples/HelloGadgets-1.0.0/gadget.xml`

Select `OK` to add the gadget to your home page.
